entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low.
